Uses of Class
Screen

    • Uses of Screen in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of Screen in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FirstScreen
      The FirstScreen class represents an Option Menu.
      class  GameScreen
      The GameScreen represents the game screen and has all of the Enemies, Platforms, Checkpoints, Spikes and Hero.
      class  InstructionScreen
      The InstructionScreen class represents the Screen which displays the instructions and the keyboard layout.
      class  VictoryScreen
      The VictoryScreen represents the victory screen drawn when the Boss is defeated.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Screen DrawingSurface.getActiveScreen()
